context: The word 'hevonen' means 'horse' in Finnish. It is a masculine noun and belongs to the Kotus type 38/nainen declension, which doesnâ€™t involve gradation. The plural form is 'hevoset'. There are many possessive forms depending on who owns the horse, as shown in the dictionary definition.  The word can also refer to horsepower when used in compounds like 'hevosvoima'.
